title: Mentor-Mentee Matching Network
description: Interactive bipartite graph visualization showing mentor-mentee pairing with skill similarity scoring, cross-departmental reach bonus, and shared project history. Mentee, mentor candidates, and shared skill nodes form a three-column layout with adjustable weighting.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Mentor Matching
Bipartite Graphs
Skill Similarity
Organizational Analytics
Graph Databases
prerequisites: Familiarity with node and edge properties
